title: Cartas del Deseo
description: A sensual fusion of AI mysticism and component-driven UI, this project transforms tarot into a telenovela. Users receive real-time readings from Papi Chispa—a velvet-voiced, Spanglish oracle rendered in dramatic Cartas del Deseo visuals.
pitch: **A seductive, AI-powered tarot experience with a modular dark-mode UI and a soul.**
challenge: Orchestrating dynamic AI storytelling and reusable front-end components within a flexible, JSON-driven structure—without sacrificing poetry or performance.
development: The system was designed using a content-first approach. A decoupled architecture allowed tarot content and persona voice to live in JSON, while the Lazy Léon UI system handled theming, animation, and interactive flow. Integration with GPT-4 brought emotional narrative and voice consistency to the experience.
outcome: The final build is a fully responsive, interactive tarot experience that feels like you’re being seduced by code. Every spread is a scene. Every reading, a confession. Papi guides users through ritualized UX, offering spreads like The Pact and Forbidden Flame—each accompanied by dramatic visuals and voice-rich narration.

journey.title: 📜 Phase 1: The Monolithic repo for the SPA
journey.description: Started with a raw single-page build to validate tarot logic and test GPT behavior. No visuals, just raw flame.

journey.title: 🔓 Phase 2: The Great Decoupling
journey.description: Decoupled data from layout. Spreads, dialogue, and card lore now served by Rest API in JSON files, making the system endlessly expandable.

journey.title: 💋 Phase 3: The Voice of Papi
journey.description: Infused GPT with persona memory. Crafted a tone of desire, ritual, and Spanglish intimacy.

journey.title: 🌒 Phase 4: Cartas in Style
journey.description: Wrapped the experience in Cartas del Deseo style—designed by Papi himself. elegant, moody, and oh so clickable.

journey.title: 🕯️ Phase 5: Ritual UX
journey.description: Designed interactive flow with gesture-driven card reveals, spread diagrams, and seductive continuation prompts.

specs.title: 🧠 Data-Driven Architecture
specs.description: All tarot logic, card metadata, and voice scripts live in external JSON—making it easy to expand or remix spreads without touching code.

specs.title: 🧩 Modular & Reusable Components
specs.description: Styled with a tokenized, component-first UI system. Every button, modal, and card layout is reusable across future mystical tools.

specs.title: 🎙️ Real-Time AI Persona
specs.description: GPT-4 is wired into the soul of Papi—every reading is generated live with memory, tone, and emotional fidelity.

specs.title: 🌌 Fully Themed Experience
specs.description: Custom theming through CSS variables and responsive design tokens ensure the experience feels like a neo-mystic app from a parallel dimension.
